Text: Convergence between poorer and richer countries comes to a halt  In 2018, gross financial assets in emerging markets not only declined for the first time, but the decline of -0.4% was also more pronounced than in the industrialized countries (-0.1%). The weak development in China, where assets fell by 3.4%, played a key role in this.
Cause: The weak development in China, where assets fell by 3.4%, played a key role in this.
Effect: Convergence between poorer and richer countries comes to a halt  In 2018, gross financial assets in emerging markets not only declined for the first time, but the decline of -0.4% was also more pronounced than in the industrialized countries (-0.1%).
